text:
Question 165) The temperature t of an oven (in degrees centigrade) is reduced by a system from the moment of its shutdown (t = 0) and varies according to the expression t (t) = - t 2 4 + 400, with t in minutes. For safety reasons, the oven lock is only released for opening when the oven reaches the temperature of 39 Â° C.
What is the minimum waiting time, in minutes, after turning off the oven so that the door can be opened?
A) 19.0
B) 19.8
C) 20.0
D) 38.0
E) 39.0
